project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a terminal-based contact book application allowing users to add, search, update, and delete contacts. Contacts will be stored in a JSON file.

task.name: Implement functionality to add a new contact
Implement functionality to search for a contact by name
Implement functionality to update an existing contact
Implement functionality to delete a contact
Implement functionality to read and write contacts to a JSON file
Write tests for each of the functionalities above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
